SEARCH

Class AppointmentOutcome

java.lang.Object
AppointmentOutcome
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class AppointmentOutcome extends Object implements Serializable
Represents the outcome of a medical appointment, including services provided and consultation notes. This class implements Serializable for persistent storage of appointment outcomes.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

    static final double
    APPOINTMENT_BASE_COST
    Base cost for any appointment before additional services.

  • Field Details

    • APPOINTMENT_BASE_COST

      public static final double APPOINTMENT_BASE_COST
      Base cost for any appointment before additional services.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • AppointmentOutcome

      public AppointmentOutcome(String appointmentId, LocalDateTime outcomeDateTime, String servicesProvided, String consultationNotes)
      Constructs a new AppointmentOutcome with the specified details. The outcomeDateTime is automatically set to the current time.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The unique identifier of the associated appointment
      outcomeDateTime - The date and time of the outcome (automatically set)
      servicesProvided - Description of medical services provided during the appointment
      consultationNotes - Detailed notes from the consultation

  • Method Details

    • deserialize

      protected static Map<String,AppointmentOutcome> deserialize()
      Deserializes appointment outcomes from a file.
      Returns:
      Map of appointment IDs to their outcomes, or null if deserialization fails

    • serialize

      protected static boolean serialize(Map<String,AppointmentOutcome> allAppointmentOutcomes)
      Serializes appointment outcomes to a file. Creates a new HashMap to ensure serializability.
      Parameters:
      allAppointmentOutcomes - Map of appointment outcomes to serialize
      Returns:
      true if serialization is successful, false otherwise

    • getOutcomeDateTime

      public LocalDateTime getOutcomeDateTime()
      Gets the date and time when this outcome was recorded.
      Returns:
      LocalDateTime when the outcome was created

    • getServicesProvided

      public String getServicesProvided()
      Gets the description of services provided during the appointment.
      Returns:
      String describing the medical services provided

    • getConsultationNotes

      public String getConsultationNotes()
      Gets the consultation notes recorded during the appointment.
      Returns:
      String containing the consultation notes

    • getAppointmentCost

      public double getAppointmentCost()
      Gets the total cost of the appointment including base cost and any additional charges. The base cost is defined by APPOINTMENT_BASE_COST constant.
      Returns:
      double The total cost of the appointment

    • setAppointmentCost

      public void setAppointmentCost(double newAppointmentCost)
      Updates the total cost of the appointment. This method allows modification of the appointment cost to account for additional services or special circumstances beyond the base cost.
      Parameters:
      newAppointmentCost - The new total cost to set for the appointment

    • createOutcome

      public static AppointmentOutcome createOutcome(Appointment appointment, String servicesProvided, String consultationNotes)
      Creates a new AppointmentOutcome instance for a given appointment.
      Parameters:
      appointment - The appointment for which to create an outcome
      servicesProvided - Description of services provided during the appointment
      consultationNotes - Detailed notes from the consultation
      Returns:
      A new AppointmentOutcome instance
